TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the general formatting requirements specified by NTCIP 2306.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document properly defined named 2306TstData1a10.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the Definitions section requirements specified by NTCIP 2306.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the definition tag named 2306TstData1a21.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the definition tag’s name attribute named 2306TstData1a22.wsdl. A WSDL document with malformed standard namespace attributes (i.e. xmlns) named 2306TstData1a23.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the Types section requirements specified by NTCIP 2306.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the types section named 2306TstData1a31.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the types start tag named 2306TstData1a32.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the types end tag named 2306TstData1a33.wsdl. A WSDL document that references an external schema file without the supporting external schema file available named 2306TstData1a34.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the Messages section requirements specified by NTCIP 2306.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document without any message sections named 2306TstData1a41.wsdl. A WSDL document missing a message start tag named 2306TstData1a42.wsdl. A WSDL document missing a message end tag named 2306TstData1a43.wsdl. A WSDL document with a message name attribute starting with other than “MSG” named 2306TstData1a44.wsdl. A WSDL document with a misspelled schema message name named 2306TstData1a45.wsdl. A WSDL document with a part element attribute missing the namespace reference (tmdd:) named 2306TstData1a46.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the PortType element requirements specified by NTCIP 2306 for a SOAP over HTTP Request-Response operation.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the portType section named 2306TstData1a51.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the portType start tag named 2306TstData1a52.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the portType end tag named 2306TstData1a53.wsdl. A WSDL document missing a message referenced by the portType tag named 2306TstData1a54.wsdl. A WSDL document with a message unreferenced by the portType tag named 2306TstData1a55.wsdl. A WSDL document with an operation name starting with a value other than “OP” named 2306TstData1a56.wsdl. A WSDL document with the input message following the output message named 2306TstData1a57.wsdl. A WSDL document containing an input element with a message attribute that starts with a value other than “tns:” named 2306TstData1a58.wsdl. A WSDL document containing an output element with a message attribute that starts with a value other than “tns:” named 2306TstData1a59.wsdl. A WSDL document containing an input element with a message reference to a message missing from the message element named 2306TstData1a5A.wsdl. A WSDL document containing an output element with a reference to a message missing from the message element named 2306TstData1a5B.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the Binding element requirements specified by NTCIP 2306 for a SOAP over HTTP Request-Response operation.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the binding section named 2306TstData1a61.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the binding start tag named 2306TstData1a62.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the binding end tag named 2306TstData1a63.wsdl. A WSDL document without a soap:binding element immediately following the binding element named 2306TstData1a64.wsdl. A WSDL document with a soap:binding style attribute other than document named 2306TstData1a65.wsdl. A WSDL document with a soap:binding transport attribute different from http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http named 2306TstData1a66.wsdl. A WSDL document with a operation name attribute not matching the operation names specified in the portType section named 2306TstData1a67.wsdl. A WSDL document with the soap:operation element’s soapAction attribute missing named 2306TstData1a68.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <soap:operation> tag followed by an <output> </output> section (i.e. missing the input element) named 2306TstData1a69.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <input> tag followed by a <output> tag (i.e. missing the <soap:body> tag) named 2306TstData1a6A.wsdl. A WSDL document with the of the <soap:body element’s use attribute set to “literall” named 2306TstData1a6B.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <output> tag set missing named 2306TstData1a6C.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <output> tag followed by a </output> tag (i.e. missing the <soap:body> tag) named 2306TstData1a6D.wsdl. A WSDL document with the of the soap:body element’s use attribute set to “literall” named 2306TstData1a6E.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the Service element requirements specified by NTCIP 2306 for a SOAP over HTTP Request-Response operation.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the service section named 2306TstData1a71.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the service start tag named 2306TstData1a72.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the service end tag named 2306TstData1a73.wsdl. A WSDL document with the service endpoint of “http :” named 2306TstData1a74.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <service> tag not containing a name attribute named 2306TstData1a75.wsdl. A WSDL document with the port element’s name attribute missing named 2306TstData1a76.wsdl. A WSDL document with the port element’s binding attribute missing named 2306TstData1a77.wsdl. A WSDL document with the port element’s binding attribute referencing a binding not defined in the binding section named 2306TstData1a78.wsdl. A WSDL document without the soap:address element following the port element named 2306TstData1a79.wsdl. A WSDL document with the soap:address element’s location attribute missing named 2306TstData1a7A.wsdl. A WSDL document with the soap:address element’s location attribute specifying an improperly formed URL named 2306TstData1a7B.wsdl. A WSDL document The service endpoint must specify a valid URL.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

A WSDL document containing an output element with a reference to a message missing from the message element named 2306TstData1b5D.wsdl.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the PortType element requirements specified by NTCIP 2306 for a XML over FTP Request-Only operation.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the portType section named 2306TstData3a51.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the portType start tag named 2306TstData3a52.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the portType end tag named 2306TstData3a53.wsdl. A WSDL document missing a message referenced by the portType tag named 2306TstData3a54.wsdl. A WSDL document with an operation name starting with a value other than “OP” named 2306TstData3a55.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the Binding element requirements specified by NTCIP 2306 for a XML over FTP Request-Only operation.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the binding section named 2306TstData3a61.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the binding start tag named 2306TstData3a62.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the binding end tag named 2306TstData3a63.wsdl. A WSDL document without a ftp:binding element immediately following the binding element named 2306TstData3a64.wsdl. A WSDL document with a operation name attribute not matching the operation names specified in the portType section named 2306TstData3a65.wsdl. A WSDL document with the < operation> tag followed by an <input> tag (i.e. ftp:operation tag missing) named 2306TstData3a66.wsdl. A WSDL document with the ftp:operation element’s location attribute missing named 2306TstData3a67.wsdl. A WSDL document with the ftp:operation element’s location attribute set to ““ (i.e. a blank file name) named 2306TstData3a68.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <ftp:operation> tag followed by an <output> </output> section (i.e. missing the input element) named 2306TstData3a69.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <input> tag followed by a <output> tag (i.e. missing the <ftp:urlEncoded> tag) named 2306TstData3a6A.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <output> tag set missing named 2306TstData3a6B.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <output> tag followed by a </output> tag (i.e. missing the <mime:content> tag) named 2306TstData3a6C.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the Service element requirements specified by NTCIP 2306 for a XML over FTP Request-Only operation.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseInputs: A WSDL document missing the service section named 2306TstData3a71.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the service start tag named 2306TstData3a72.wsdl. A WSDL document missing the service end tag named 2306TstData3a73.wsdl. A WSDL document with the <service> tag not containing a name attribute named 2306TstData3a74.wsdl. A WSDL document with the port element’s name attribute missing named 2306TstData3a75.wsdl. A WSDL document with the port element’s binding attribute missing named 2306TstData3a76.wsdl. A WSDL document with the port element’s binding attribute referencing a binding not defined in the binding section named 2306TstData3a77.wsdl. A WSDL document without the ftp:address element following the port element named 2306TstData3a78.wsdl. A WSDL document with the ftp:address element’s location attribute missing named 2306TstData3a79.wsdl.
TestCaseDescription.testCaseOutputs: Each input execution shall generate an RI Test Result Status of Passed or Failed associated with the matching expected result shown in the Test Case Data Variable Table in the appendix.

TestCaseDescription.testCaseDescription: To verify that the RI NTCIP 2306 Conformance Test Suite identifies WSDL documents that conform to the FTP transport requirements specified by NTCIP 2306 for a XML over FTP operation.
